Character.DisplayName: Island Mayor
Character.Description: The beleaguered leader trying to keep order on the dangerous island

Character.DisplayName: Cave Runner
Character.Description: A scout who navigates the dangerous lava tubes

Character.DisplayName: Bandit Enforcer
Character.Description: A brutal fighter who keeps the other bandits in line

Character.DisplayName: Tunnel Boss
Character.Description: A ruthless leader who knows every cave in the volcano

Character.DisplayName: Captured Merchant
Character.Description: A merchant being held for ransom by the bandits

Character.DisplayName: Hi no Kami
Character.Description: An ancient fire spirit dwelling within the sacred volcano

Character.DisplayName: Kaji no Shogun
Character.Description: A warrior spirit of living flame that guards the inner sanctum

Character.DisplayName: Worried Elder
Character.Description: A community member concerned about the prophet's influence

Character.DisplayName: Mountain Seer
Character.Description: A self-proclaimed mystic who claims to speak with the volcano

Character.DisplayName: Devoted Acolyte
Character.Description: A true believer who defends the prophet absolutely

Character.DisplayName: Former Follower
Character.Description: Someone who once believed but now has doubts

Character.DisplayName: Temple Guardian
Character.Description: A warrior sworn to protect the prophet

Character.DisplayName: Skeptical Scholar
Character.Description: An academic who has been investigating the prophet

Character.DisplayName: Eccentric Collector
Character.Description: A collector of oddities who acquired an unusual map

Character.DisplayName: Local Historian
Character.Description: An expert on local history and ancient sites

Character.DisplayName: Wilderness Hermit
Character.Description: A recluse who has lived in the wilds for decades

Character.DisplayName: Rival Treasure Hunter
Character.Description: Another seeker who has heard rumors of the cache

Character.DisplayName: Volcanic Spirit
Character.Description: A mysterious presence that protects the mountain's secrets

Character.DisplayName: Geologist Guide
Character.Description: A researcher who studies the volcano and knows its history

Character.DisplayName: Volcanic Blacksmith
Character.Description: An elderly smith who uses the volcano's heat to forge steel

Character.DisplayName: Bitter Wanderer
Character.Description: One who sought the technique and was found unworthy

Character.DisplayName: Ambitious Seeker
Character.Description: Another who seeks to learn the lost technique

Character.DisplayName: Mountain Village Elder
Character.Description: An elder who knows the old paths

Character.DisplayName: Weathered Elder
Character.Description: An old islander whose family has lived on the volcano for generations

Character.DisplayName: Ferry Worker
Character.Description: A dock hand who saw someone suspicious during the last ash fall

Character.DisplayName: Desperate Evacuee
Character.Description: Someone who lost everything in a recent eruption

Character.DisplayName: Curio Dealer
Character.Description: A trader who sells volcanic souvenirs to tourists

Character.DisplayName: Village Headwoman
Character.Description: A stoic leader who has guided her people through eruptions before

Character.DisplayName: Young Firefighter
Character.Description: A volunteer who helps during volcanic emergencies

Character.DisplayName: Refugee Healer
Character.Description: A skilled healer who tends to the group's wounds

Character.DisplayName: Quiet Stranger
Character.Description: A mysterious person who joined the refugees recently

Character.DisplayName: Frightened Child
Character.Description: A child who got separated from the group

Character.DisplayName: Pursuer Scout
Character.Description: A hunter tracking the refugees

Character.DisplayName: Pursuer Captain
Character.Description: The leader of those hunting the refugees

Character.DisplayName: Border Guard
Character.Description: A guard at the safe territory border

Character.DisplayName: Onsen Owner
Character.Description: A passionate proprietor of a traditional volcanic hot spring

Character.DisplayName: Guild Enforcer
Character.Description: The muscle behind the guild's operations

Character.DisplayName: Rival Guild Master
Character.Description: Leader of the opposing guild, ruthless and cunning

Character.DisplayName: Rival Lieutenant
Character.Description: The rival guild's second-in-command

Character.DisplayName: Guild Informant
Character.Description: A shadowy figure who sells information to both sides

Character.DisplayName: City Magistrate
Character.Description: A neutral official who can mediate between the guilds

Character.DisplayName: Rival Enforcer
Character.Description: A brutal enforcer for the rival guild

Character.DisplayName: Island Supplier
Character.Description: A trader who braves the ferry crossing to supply remote areas

Character.DisplayName: Toll Collector
Character.Description: A gruff checkpoint guard who demands payment for passage

Character.DisplayName: Highway Robber
Character.Description: A desperate criminal who preys on travelers

Character.DisplayName: Town Shopkeeper
Character.Description: A local merchant eager for fresh goods

Character.DisplayName: Guild Factor
Character.Description: A representative of a merchant guild with deep pockets

Character.DisplayName: Roadside Innkeeper
Character.Description: A welcoming host who knows all the local gossip
